entry.title: Monday night: Light snow mixed with freezing drizzle. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Light snow at times mixed with freezing drizzle. Fog patches. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 9:19 PM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 9:19 PM CST Monday 16 January 2023
